message.content: Use the get_fact tool for both 'cactus' and 'swift', then summarize both facts.
{"content":"Cacti store water in thick stems to survive arid climates.","name":"get_fact"}
{"name":"get_fact","content":"Swift is a type-safe language that emphasizes expressive syntax and performance."}

The cactus stores water in its thick stems to thrive in dry environments. Swift is a type-safe programming language known for its efficiency and expressive syntax, commonly used for iOS development. Both facts highlight unique adaptations—biological (cactus) and computational (Swift)—to their respective domains.
